 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Consider This is a current affairs program dedicated to challenging the status quo. Hosted by Emmy Award-winning journalist Antonio Mora, the show features hard-hitting interviews with newsmakers and nightly panel discussions on issues important to American viewers. We aim to cultivate a dynamic conversation about the issues that matter to you, and your voice is critical to that dialogue.
imdb.title: Consider This
plot: _Consider This_ (qv) is a current affairs program dedicated to challenging the status quo. Hosted by Emmy Award-winning journalist Antonio Mora.::Al Jazeera English

_Consider This_ (qv) is a current affairs program dedicated to challenging the status quo. Hosted by Emmy Award-winning journalist Antonio Mora, the show features hard-hitting interviews with newsmakers and nightly panel discussions on issues important to American viewers. We aim to cultivate a dynamic conversation about the issues that matter to you, and your voice is critical to that dialogue.::Al Jazeera English
